snippet.title: Luigi's Hot Dog Dippers
snippet.description: Manny helped Luigi fix his hot dog cart, and your preschooler will love helping you to fix this fresh take on 'pigs in a blanket.' It swaps storebought croissant dough for wholesome pretzel dough.
